Others: Bailey Falter has pitched six no-hit innings against the Miami Marlins on Wednesday.
Falter (7-7, 4.45 ERA) struck out the side on 10 pitches in the first inning.
In four seasons since debuting in 2021, Falter is 17-21 with a 4.65 ERA in 84 games (55 starts) for the Pirates and the Philadelphia Phillies.
